price: Напротив! Божанства ће да порекну њихово обожавање, и биће им противници.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَيَكۡفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ضِدًّا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kallā sayakfurūna biʿibādatihim wayakūnūna ʿalayhim ḍiddan
